summary: Project now includes UI theming changes (purple text, new background inspired by provided reference) and a Play button redirect to the provided Meta experiences URL, in addition to the in-app Privacy Policy page.

existing_features.title: Add a new user-accessible navigation item labeled "Privacy Policy" (as a tab, menu item, or header link—matching the app’s existing navigation pattern) that opens a dedicated Privacy Policy view/page.

Establish a coherent visual theme for the Privacy Policy page (and the new navigation item) that fits a playful game community vibe using Tailwind styling, and apply it consistently within this feature (avoid blue/purple as the primary palette).
Fix the app layout routing so that navigating to the Privacy Policy route actually renders the Privacy Policy page content when the user clicks the "Privacy Policy" navigation item.

Update the displayed company/brand name for the Chimp Factory Hub from "RedVelvet Production" / "RedVelvet Productions"-related branding to exactly "RedVelvet Productions" wherever that company name is shown in the UI.

Replace/ensure the Privacy Policy page content includes the user-provided Privacy Policy text in English, structured with clear headings and bullet lists, including these sections: (1) "Information We Collect" with "We may collect" and "We do not collect" lists plus the "All data is used only to" list and the statement about not selling/sharing data; (2) "Asset Ripping & Intellectual Property" with the statement that all assets belong to Chimp Factory, the prohibition, the "If you:" list, and the "We reserve the right to:" list; (3) "Community Rules" with the rule list and consequences plus the platform reporting note; (4) "Age & Safety" with the under-13 statement and encouragement list; (5) "Changes to This Policy" with the update statement.

Update the Privacy Policy page styling so that blue/purple are not used as the primary palette for section framing/icons (keep the playful game community vibe consistent with the existing warm amber/orange theme).

Set the app background to visually match the user-uploaded pink/purple swirl reference image, using a full-screen background image (cover, centered) that appears behind all pages (Home and Privacy Policy).

Update the app’s styling so that all user-facing text is purple by default (including headings, body text, navigation text, and footer text), replacing the current amber/orange gradient emphasis where it affects text color.

Remove emojis from UI text/content (including hero icons and any emoji-prefixed headings) and replace them with non-emoji equivalents (plain text and/or existing icon components) while keeping the same meaning.
Make the “Play Now” button on the Home page open the provided Meta experiences URL for Chimp Factory when clicked.

new_feature_requests.summary: Add a Privacy Policy tab/page that displays the provided Privacy Policy text (for Chimp Factory / BananaSplit).

Render the provided Privacy Policy content in English on the Privacy Policy view/page with clear typography and structure (sections, headings, and bullet lists) and include that it applies to the user’s two games: "Chimp Factory" and "BananaSplit".
Update the displayed company name/label in Chimp Factory Hub from "RedVelvet Productions" to the user’s desired value (user requested a change).
Update the app UI styling to use purple text throughout and remove emojis from UI text.
Change the app background to match the user-provided reference (pink swirl-style background).
Update the Play button so clicking it navigates to the provided Meta experiences URL for Chimp Factory.
